## Catalog Description

Semester course; 3 lecture hours. 3 credits. Prerequisite: CMSC 502. A study of operating systems including those in multiprocessor and distributed environments. I/O programming, resource management (including processor and memory management), security and system performance evaluation.


## Restrictions including pre- or co-requisities
 
CMSC 502.

## Description

A study of operating systems including those in multiprocessor and distributed environments. I/O programming, resource management (including processor and memory management), security and system performance evaluation.

## Topics

input/output, multiprocessor environments, operating systems, resources management, security, system performance
